monolith noun [C]
(ORGANIZATION)

monolith noun [C]
(GROUP OF PEOPLE)
a group of people who are thought of as being all the same: The study documented the diverse backgrounds of the Latino population, which is often viewed wrongly by outsiders as an ethnic monolith.
